document_data.mainbody: '''Inar Venenellin''', also known as '''Pyrultimus''', was one of the merchant-lords of [[Imdolphyn]], and the leader of the [[Cult of Reborn Flame]] that operated out of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]] in the late years of the 15th century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Inar was a human male of 50 years in [[1480 DR]]. He was extremely lean, and perpetually sunburned.
document_data.Activities:
As one of the merchant-lords, Inar had a high-ranking position in Imdarn society, advising Lord [[Othmeera Talask]] in matters of government. He also had a business in ship supplies and hiring of sailors and crew.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|8-9}} He was well-liked and popular among the citizens of Imdolphyn.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|14}}

This was a ruse, however, as his true goals were to awaken [[Achazar]] and use the power of the [[primordial]] to transcend mortality. To that end, he led the Cult of Reborn Flame under the alias of Pyrultimus, to achieve his goals.
